description: Returns details about a scan, including whether or not a scan has completed.

parameters.name: scanName
parameters.description: The name of the scan you want to view details about.

nested_items.name: analysisType
nested_items.description: The type of analysis CodeGuru Security performed in the scan, either Security or All. The Security type only generates findings related to security. The All type generates both security findings and quality findings.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time the scan was created.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: Details about the error that causes a scan to fail to be retrieved.

nested_items.name: numberOfRevisions
nested_items.description: The number of times a scan has been re-run on a revised resource.

nested_items.name: runId
nested_items.description: UUID that identifies the individual scan run.

nested_items.name: scanNameArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the scan name.

nested_items.name: scanState
nested_items.description: The current state of the scan. Returns either InProgress, Successful, or Failed.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the scan was last updated. Only available for STANDARD scan types.
